Table 1. 3D object detection AP on KITTI val moderate set. We 
compare inference time and AP among different box regression 
network architectures.

Table 2. 3D object detection AP on KITTI val set. We conduct ex-
periments to show importance of the post process. "Score-NMS" 
means using classification scores as NMS sorting scores. "IoU-
NMS" means for each prediction, we use its largest IoU among all 
ground-truth boxes as the sorting score.

compared to other state-of-the-art methods.

Table 7. Recall of generated proposals on KITTI val set.

Table 8. 3D object detection AP on KITTI val set. A tick in canon-
ized item means using canonical coordinates rather than original 
coordinates as part of feature. A tick in "semantic" means using 
points feature from 3D semantic segmentation backbone in pro-
posal feature.

caption:
Table 9. 3D object detection AP on KITTI val moderate set. Our 
experiments analyze influence of our 3D IoU branch. "3D" means 
using 3D IoU branch for post-processing.

Table 10. 3D object detection AP on KITTI val moderate set. Our 
experiments analyze influence of different ways to use 3D IoU 
branch. "3D-IoU" means only using 3D IoU as NMS sorting 
score. "cls-score ? 3D-IoU" indicates the way we describe in 
Section 3.3. 

transformation, AP increases by 11.1% on moderate set.
